DISCOVERY OP AMERICA.
In the Boston Advertiser there is an articln on the subject
of the probable discovery of America, hy some navigator, anterior to the time of Columbus. That Greenland was discovered and peopled long before ihe age of Columbus, is
most certain, but ns Greenland is now considered by geographers a vast island, its discovery cannot be regarded as that of
